I’m 5’ and size 4-6 and got this in black. Love the fit - it’s slightly oversized but the proportions keep it from looking baggy/sloppy. It’s got the perfect amount of stretch and it’s warm without being bulky. I’ve worn it with joggers and it’s cozy, and I’ve worn it tucked into high-waisted wide-leg pants for a more polished look - it’s so versatile. My favorite thing about it is the ribbed material - it adds texture and interest to elevate it just enough to be more than just a great basic. I’m impressed by the quality. Will definitely be buying more colors.

评论用户: Susan Smith | The Social Blonde Files
评论概述: It’s has thumb holes! Love love love this!
评论详情: I can’t stop reaching for this 3/4 zip pullover! I am wearing the Beige White in an XXL. For reference, I am 5’10” and 200lbs. I have lost weight since purchasing this so I plan to order one size down and I also want to order it in a few other colors. I love the soft ribbed detailing and that it has thumb holes! The collar stands up without flopping over and looking sloppy. Most of all, it kept me warm but not too hot. It can easily be layered with a raincoat or jacket. The zipper slides easily, the pullover washed easily and I lined dried it. There is no pilling after a few wears and washes. This is a definite yes to purchase from me!
I want all the colors
This was really cute and soft but as soon as I washed it (on cold) and dried it (air dry hanging) it was too shrunken to wear. At least 2 sizes down.

I love the color and the fit of this sweater. It's s long enough to wear with leggings and it's super comfortable. It has a nice thickness to it and is enough to keep you warm. The material is pretty stretchy and seems of good quality. This has been one of my go-to sweaters for this winter and I'm sure in the fall.

As we know not everything on Amazon looks exactly as pictured. this actually does. I really like the quality in the fill of the fabric and I would highly suggest if you want an elevated look to your wardrobe to buy this.
Love this half zip sweater! It fits so comfortably and keeps me warm. I will probably order another one in a different color!

So very happy with the quality of this sweater. I got a med. 140lbs. 5’7”. Fits perfectly. So impressed going back for more colors.
This is my new favorite shirt. It’s cute, perfect to wear with leggings without looking frumpy, and is great quality. I need more in more colors.

Material is lighter/thinner than expected, but not too thin. Length works for leggings on 5’7” height and arm length is great. Thumb holes could be a tiny bit wider for comfort.  I sized up one for extra room. Sizing seems to be TTS.

I bought this in one color and liked it so much, I ordered another. Stands up to washing. I would recommend.

This top is great. The quality is fantastic, the ribbed texture gives it a flattering, chic look. It’s true to size, super comfortable to wear as one layer or two. It’s the right amount of stretchiness that it can be an outer layer but I often wear it as my only layer. Really love it!

Thick enough to keep warm but not too thick for our Texas “winters”.

I love this shirt. It drops to my thigh and I love the tummy coverage.  The shirt is so comfortable and the fabric is thick and of good quality. Easy to wash, and has quickly become my favorite every day shirt.

评论概述: Very Good Quality, Don't Miss This One!
评论详情: This is thicker than expected, and I am super happy about it. It fits as expected and I love the tighter cuffs. The lines are flattering in the pattern. I am happy with the zip; in the colder months, I prefer to have the option to open up or zip up to my ears. It looks polished with a dark pair of jeans and boots, or it looks casual with regular jeans and tennis shoes. I can literally wear it to work or to watch my son's games. Very cut and comfortable. The wight is great for colder days. I love that it is such a versatile item. With all the items that you end up getting that are not quite quality, you get discouraged buying on Amazon as well as other large distributors. This one, don't sleep on. It is worth it.
Comfy fit

I’m a medium by actual size but I wanted this baggy so I ordered a XL. I’m very satisfied. This seems to run true to size. It’s warm and nice to throw over a tank or shirt. Good fall or chilly weather. Not for a winter jacket. Highly recommend! Btw, both colors are exactly like pic shown.

Great quality, very warm, fits great, and has a nice softness to it.  I typically wear a large in most tops so I ordered this in a large. It fits amazing. I could probably even size down a size if I wanted it to be a little more form fitting. I’m tall and have long arms. Finding long sleeves that fit my arms is hard! This sweater exceeds my expectations. The arms are super long. The sleeves go down halfway down my hands.  It feels so comfortable when I wear it! And I love the thumb holes on the sleeves too! It’s a great winter sweater find! Definitely recommend!

I had ordered this pull-over in blue, size large & it was a perfect fit.  Because I liked it so much I ordered a second one in a large but a different color.  It was at least 2 inches wider in the body which made it look sloppy.  Back it goes!!

I love this so much I have it in 4 colors!!! The material feels amazing and it is very well made. The colors are exactly as in the pictures. It is not see through and can be worn on its own, but it is also thin enough for wear with a puffer vest. Great value for the price. Very fashionable for fall!

This is a very nice pullover for cold weather.  The burgundy color is very nice, deep and rich and flattering.  This is warm and thick without being overwhelmingly heavy.  The zipper is good quality and works well.  I like the cut of the bottom of the sweater - the bottom rib is different but it isn’t close or clingy.  I’m not crazy about the neckline as it is a little too high for comfort for me.  It’s a soft and comfortable sweater but I admit that the thumb holes don’t do it for me.  I know many love them but they just feel awkward and uncomfortable to me - I’m sure a function of my age and generation.
PROS: This lightweight, pullover V neck sweater has a quarter zipper, thumb holes and nice knitted fabric that fits comfortably. It runs true to size, for a looser fit you might want to size up.

While the product would be five stars for me, I’m giving it one star due to needing a response from the seller and not receiving one. Amazon provided a link to contact the seller directly, and I did that twice. And Amazon is no help, either- continuing to instruct me to use the link to contact the seller. While the defect isn’t major, it does affect the use of the item. I’ve considered trying to fix it myself, but if it unravels, then what?

This pull over is great for weekend wear! I love that it is not too thick, but warm. The knot and ribbing of the fabric makes it nice and soft. The color is a deep olive green which is the stylish color this fall. It fits maybe just slightly small or true to size. It holds up great in the wash and doesn’t fade. The length is perfect and the high-low side untucked style and ribbing detail adds to the sophistication of this piece. I can wear it with jeans or leggings for the perfect fall outfit. My favorite part is the thumb holes for extra hand warmth on colder fall days. Definitely a great addition to my closet!

Super soft, the material is thick and a little heavy which is perfect for fall. Fits true to size, if you want it a little oversized I would size up.
